phrases: Naganohara Mio - Schoolgirl, Blue hair twin tails.
Aioi Yuuko - Schoolgirl, Chin length light brown hair.
Minakami Mai - Schoolgirl, Long dark hair, glasses.
(Nano uses the -san honorific, the doctor does not).
Always use OK and all right, nyan
> A humble request to all TLs...
When you TL a sign, can you please leave a timecode with it, so we can find it without having to search through the entire vid.
In front of the 1-Q lectern Naganohara Mio: Sunk
You cannot have too much ice cream and juice!
shi kou kai wa gu cha gu cha ko n ran shaa ba dee bee doo bee, yeah!
ko nna... ko to... ha ji me te da yo
I just realized for the first time that I had fallen in love
All day long, it is only you, you, you; I just could not avoid it
Somehow, somehow I am different from usual when I am with you
Nope, it is an unrequited love, whoops, we made eye contact
Something is making my heart beat faster sha ba da ba de bee doo wa ba dee ay
My train of thought derails with a *splat* *splat* shaaba deebee doobee, yeah!
This... is the... very first time for me
Do I have a fever, I wonder?
The awakening of love that you induced it was without pride
T-T-These stupid hands are shaking and from here, we will proceed
No no no, I have messed up my words a bit and so there is an awkward silence
About your about your feelings I really want to know, it is an you-you-un-unrequited love
First love always in the school zone
A glittering light I will fall in love
I am flying through the sky
Wake up in the morning, brush my teeth and in the blink of an eye, it is 10pm.
Today also, we laughed a whole lot; we had a great time.
With my friends, I played the fool, and we all played around.
And when the blood began to run, we wished it was a coincidence.
I cannot talk about the first time, it would not be in-character.
Hey, we can meet again tomorrow, right?
As my eyelids close, I see you glittering.
Today was fun too, was not it?
So happy, so happy, how do you do?
We will meet again tomorrow, goodnight!
I will soon be dreaming, goodnight!
The Shinonome household was at peace again today.
Why do magnets pull against each other?
Everything in this world can be proven by science.
There are things that may be eliminated...
Spiritual phenomena such as a world after death, ghosts and ghost stories.
There is no way those kinds of sleep-inducing things could be real!
I do not believe in spiritualists!
Using my day off, I spent 8 hours going one-way to Mt. Osore.
Getting closer to the summit, the beating of my heart increases.
I wonder if a spiritualist really exists here.
I wonder if she would live alone here.
Let us have her summon something already.
What is this sensation of helplessness?
Could it be there is someone called Soap...?
What... if I keep asking, then eventually a contradiction point will appear.
What is the blood type of Soap?
Let us try a simpler person.
Rejecting me before even trying to summon him?
No, she is old after all.
She has to look after her health.
I should not scold her here.
Scolding people is not for me.
Just by knowing that, I should reap what I have sown.
That is not how you do it Mai-chan, did not I just explain it?
You have to hit me if you win!
It is amazing, you have got incredible concentration.
In a way, it is even more cruel than hitting me.
As I have just explained, when you lose you defend, when you win you hit, OK?
Why did you hit me now!
No, it is because I won just then.
It was not now was it, it was just then!
We are that kind of living thing you know!
OK then, let us do it again.
You have zero motivation to play!?
How much of a clown can you be?!
In my mind... something is coming.
I thought it had been reincarnated!
Ah well that does not matter, let us start.
Seriously, Mai-chan, that does not count, that does not count.
Also, hitting with the Buddha does not count either.
OK, let us do it again.
See, you can do it if you try!
Ok, let us do the next one.
Hey, why did you hit me?!
You did it properly just now!
How do I say it, because I do not want to play.
Can I take a look at your Maitreya?
Then, I will be going to the library to return the books!
Make sure you look after the house, OK?
I wonder why Nano's daruma only has one eye...
If I give it another eye I might get praised!
She might say'it is OK to eat as many snacks as you like'!
I might have made a mistake...
It is Nano's, so what do I do...
She might get mad at me!
You will not get any snacks for a long time!
You see, it did not have an eye...
It cannot be helped, try doing what I say.
Ah, Sakamoto-san, you are going out?
I am late because it took me some time to choose some new books to borrow.
Eh, what is with that stomach of yours?
No no no, that is not possible.
Um, is this some kind of game?
Your little brother is about to be born!
Oh, you do not know it?
OK, I will briefly explain it then.
First you need to prepare a piece of paper by drawing a gate in the middle like this,
then you write'yes','no' and the 50 Japanese syllabary on the page.
Although in some regions, you are supposed to draw a fried tofu on the paper instead...
For now, let us just keep it simple.
Then, for Kokkuri-san to be able to come in, you open the north-facing window.
Then you set this 10-yen coin on the gate.
We put both of our fingers on it and ask a question that you want to know about,
such as a person's secret, or who someone likes, or something that is bothering you.
If you do that, all by itself, the 10-yen coin will move and Kokkuri-san will answer your question.
First, do not do it by yourself... second, do not mess around when doing it...
or else you will be haunted by spirits...
Also, if you stop halfway through, you will be haunted, so be wary.
It is a pretty dangerous game, do not you think?
Anyway, why do not you give it a try?
Um... well that is all for today.
Tomorrow we have a mini-test, so everyone please study for it.
Would not the outcome be exactly the same for you no matter how long it is postponed?
There is something I want to ask you.
Um... about the test we had before.
I am talking about this thing that looks like it would vanish pretty easily... did you draw it, Sensei?
I thought that if I included some pictures, the test might be a little easier...
You draw very interesting pictures, Sensei.
I am bad at drawing pictures, so it was hard to understand was not it?
Could you include a picture that I have drawn next time?
I will draw something really cool!
My picture's going to be in the test.
Sensei said she will put them in.
If you draw something right now, she will definitely put yours in, maybe.
It is'definitely', but it is still'maybe'?
Uh... you are not going to draw something?
Besides, I have to return this.
Aioi-san, you are so good at drawing.
No, I am not that good...
Incidentally, his name is Samidare George.
Hold on a second you two.
Normally, what you would call cool is...
It is just like a manga.
Naganohara-san, do you draw manga or something?
I did not rip it off.
This kind of rip-off is known as homage.
An intelligent and cool look that appeals to all women of any era!
These two just do not get it!!
Anyhow, this is a rip-off too!
Tsk, tsk, tsk... they are sunglasses.
From picking you up to serving you tea... you will feel like a real lady.
I am sorry, I do not really get it.
She did not listen to my advice about contacts...
Mio-chan, you do not get it, do you?
You see, what is really cool is...
No, hold on... this... it is running?!
It looks so fast and cool!
If you think about it in a normal way...
I drew this while I was listening to jazz music.
Well then, I will hand out this morning's mini-test, so please pass them around.
I wanted to keep secret the fact that I draw.
I cannot believe I drew a picture like that...
Anyway, even though I lost control, only going to that level was a blessing amongst all the misfortune.
Yukko's going to tease me for two or three days though...
I have to keep my chin up and move forward.
Pleased to meet you, I am onomatopoeia!
You cannot help but say'Cock-a-doodle-do' in Japanese even though it is not Japanese.
The next Nichijou is the sixth.
